amendment.description: Amendment sought to reform the NIH and Cures Innovation Fund to make it a discretionary spending program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-193 to reform the NIH and Cures Innovation Fund to make it a discretionary spending program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brat amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 281 (Roll no. 431).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Brat amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 281 (Roll no. 431).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Brat.
